hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: When a man who had dyed himself with henna passed by the Prophet (ﷺ), he said: How fine this is! When another man who had dyed himself with henna and katam passed by, he said: This is better than that. Then another man who had dyed himself with yellow dye, passed by, he said: This is better than all that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خِضَابِ الصُّفْرَةِ
